title: Will Stadia Ever Catch a Break? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.18.19
description:
Go to http://thirdlove.com/games now to find your perfect-fitting bra and get 15% off your first purchase!

Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

Get 10% off all Logitech G products with promo code KFGAMES at http://logitechg.com.

Gary Whitta and Greg talk about Borderlands 3 being out of date on Stadia, Luigi's Mansion 3 DLC, and more. 

Time Stamps - 
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:06:00 - DinoCrisis Coming Back? Chris Priestman @ IGN
00:14:20 - Borderlands 3 Comes to Stadia, but there’s a catch…
00:32:25 - Luigi’s Mansion 3 DLC Announced
00:40:35 - Pokemon Go Gets Buddy Adventure
00:42:10 - TWAU2 is Starting From Scratch, Mathew Olson @ USGamer
00:50:30 - Out today
00:50:48 -  THIRDLOVE
00:52:04 -  UPSTART
00:53:10 -  LOGITECH
 Reader mail   -
00:59:15 - With everything on XBox being Backwards Compatible when Xbox Series X comes out, and with Game Pass being available I assume, this might be the most games available on a launch day of a console. Does this mean XBox won't be too concerned about having a bunch a new games ready at launch? - BJ Bernardo
01:04:01 - Squad Up: B.J. Bumgarner(PS4) bjbumgarner
01:5:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Victor Lucas
